text: (upbeat music)
- [Narrator] You're ready to take your app
to the next level,

but your database just
can't seem to keep up.
Amazon DynamoDB is a serverless, NoSQL,
fully managed database

with consistent single-digit
millisecond performance
at any scale.

As a serverless database, there
is no hardware to provision,
no operating systems to update,

and no major, minor, or
patch versions to manage.

DynamoDB automatically scales
to support your workload.
And with pay-per-request billing,
you only pay for what you use.
DynamoDB is designed to support
the most demanding application

without needing to
re-architect the database
as the application grows.
It can scale from zero
to virtually any size while delivering

the same consistent single-digit
millisecond performance.
DynamoDB delivers high availability
with zero downtime maintenance.
DynamoDB is a fully featured database

that supports ACID transactions,
strong consistency,

indexing, continuous backups,
and change data capture.

It integrates with a wide
range of other AWS services

to simplify application
development and operations.
As security is part of AWS culture,

DynamoDB offers a broad
set of security controls

and compliance standards
tailored to your industry.
(upbeat music)

Get started today with
Amazon DynamoDB Free Tier.
(upbeat music)
